scripts.deploy:polygon: yarn prepare:polygon && graph deploy --product hosted-service aireshbhat/gnosisauctionpolygon
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --product hosted-service aireshbhat/gnosisauctionservices
scripts.deploy:mumbai: yarn prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service aireshbhat/gnosisauctionmumbai
